title: A group of Poros should be called a "fluff".
body:
A group of wolfs is called a "pack".
A group of birds is called a "flock".
A group of sheep is called a "heard".
A group of poros should be called a "fluff".
Example: Braum watched the fluff of poros as they played in the snow drift.
